creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
description: five parts; gold background with gold and silver chrysanthemums with brocade bag on one side; gold and silver bouquet on opposite side
marks: Signature and Seal inscribed on bottom
medium: Lacquer, kinji, gold, silver, hiramakie, takamakie
title: [Inrō showing kusudama with long ribbons, chrysanthemum with Hotei's bag]
